subtitle: you are valuable and so is your life
sometimes our lives seem dark and
hopeless but the light we seek is within
us you have the power to change your
life and make it the life of your
dreams using positive affirmations will
give you that power say or listen to
these affirmations for at least 21 days
let's
begin I have faith in the future I have
faith in
humanity my body heals itself easily and
effortlessly I no longer fall for my
catastrophic thinking I observe them but
I am not them I am ready for the next
Beautiful chapter in my life my immune
system is strong I am
healing I help my body to heal itself
through optimistic
thoughts I trust that everything will be
better than it has ever been
before I am
learning I am growing I unconsciously
fill the world with the highest
vibrations in response the world
acknowledges my
desires life is opening its doors up to
me now I am
patient I am self-loving
I am trusting when my mind wanders
towards the worst I gently bring it back
to the best I am feeling better and
better about myself and this beautiful
world now I am now activating the
healing properties within my body my
mind is clear and I am comfortable with
this Clarity if anxiety arises I say
thank you for the protection but it is
not necessary now my transformation is
real I am becoming real I no longer
decide based on what others think I do
my own thinking and come up with my own
beliefs life is opening its arms up to
us all now I accept it humanity is on
the path towards true inner healing I
love this path I am no longer afraid of
change I embrace it my new feelings and
ideas may feel uncomfortable at first
but that is
fine I can believe in anything I put my
attention on anxiety is a reminder of my
past and my past is now behind me for
Good Love love is beginning to overtake
fear and I welcome it in there's no
longer a ceiling on my healing I am
capable of
anything my mind and body are working
together to bring me all the inner peace
that I
deserve my body heals itself easily and
effortlessly I no longer have to believe
what I once did never again will I fall
for a perception of fear fear is Just an
Illusion I now realize that worry keeps
me occupied but takes me in a direction
I refuse to go if doubt arises I thank
it for its protection and let it go when
I look in the mirror I see only
potential to heal and become who I wish
when the anxiety identity wants to pull
me back in I say no and detach myself I
have more power than I've given myself
credit for in the past I now see that
all the doubts and fears that were
installed into me from childhood are now
Vanishing and being replaced with trust
and faith my intuition guides me towards
my inner healing the faster I he the
faster the world
heals I am no longer afraid to speak up
I have a voice and it's time I Was Heard
each day is a
blessing I count each of my blessings
now I am disinterested in any ideas that
spur on panic and
anxiety I deserve inner peace I am
comfortable with inner

I need in moments of calmness I am
comfortable Now new experiences are
Pleasant and not threatening anymore I
no longer believe everything I feel I

slow down and I can see more clearly my
breathing is deep low and slow
others can be however they want to be I

Optimal Health my mental health improves

my thinking and come up with my own

Observer of my

myself I am worthy of healing and
happiness every step I take towards
healing is

take things one day at a time I am not

okay to ask for help when I need it I am

I am learning to love myself more each
